m3uLocation.description: M3U location. Can be a file or a directory.

maxFailures.description: Maximal number of failures before marking a M3U file as failed. Deactivate testing upon failures with value -1.

minSuccess.description: Minimal number of failures before marking a M3U file as succeeded. Deactivate testing upon success with value -1.

renameOnFailure.description: Whether to rename a failed M3U by prefixing with 'renamePrefix'

renamePrefix.description: Prefix to rename a failed M3U (only if 'renameOnFailure' is set to true)
